text: Luis Montes Mieza (1949 - 19 April 2018) was a Spanish anesthetist and pro- euthanasia activist. He was the Federal President of the association "Derecho a Morir Dignamente" from 2009 till his death in 2018.QUIÃ‰NES SOMOS Montes died on 19 April 2018, of a heart attack, while driving to Molina de Segura, Region of Murcia at the age of 68 or 69.Muere Luis Montes, el anestesista que en 2005 fue investigado por 'mala praxis' en las sedaciones a pacientes terminales ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Spanish activists Category:Euthanasia activists Category:Spanish physicians
title: Luis Montes Mieza
